Name: Adventures With a Girl
About the game: The new tenant is a beautiful girl, be a gentleman and take care of her needs. Features of the game: Fun and addictive gameplay. Simple operation with the mouse. Diverse puzzles and challenges. Super clear tutorial. Level hints. Various levels. The wrong action causes the girl to react differently. Very low hardware requirements. Autosave. How to play the game: Point and click elements on the stage, collect them, then try to drag and interact with other elements of the scene to solve the puzzle. Remember that clicking is just a basic operation, there will be lots of unexpected other tricks that you will have to investigate on your own.
